mapper.sql: A.GUID, A.FOLDERGUID, A.OBJECTTYPE, A.OBJECTGUID, A.PRECEDENCE, A.OPERSELECT, A.OPERADD, A.OPERREMOVE, A.CREATEUSERGUID, A.CREATETIME, A.UPDATEUSERGUID, A.UPDATETIME
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SA_ACL_SHAREDFOLDER A WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SA_ACL_SHAREDFOLDER ( GUID, FOLDERGUID, OBJECTTYPE, OBJECTNAME, OBJECTGUID, PRECEDENCE, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, OPERSELECT, OPERADD, OPERREMOVE ) VALUES( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FOLDERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OBJECTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PRECEDENCE:INTEGER#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #OPERSELECT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERADD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OPERREMOVE:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE SA_ACL_SHAREDFOLDER
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, FOLDERGUID=#FOLDERGUID#, OBJECTTYPE=#OBJECTTYPE#, OBJECTNAME=#OBJECTNAME#, OBJECTGUID=#OBJECTGUID#, PRECEDENCE=#PRECEDENCE#,
OPERSELECT=#OPERSELECT#, OPERADD=#OPERADD#, OPERREMOVE=#OPERREMOVE#
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
